response.original_title: Rivalries: The History of Michigan vs Ohio State
response.overview: The 99-game history of the Ohio State/Michigan Rivalry is told by the participants – players, coaches, historians, broadcasters and fans.  Through a series of interviews, we tell the tale of the annual battle between these two Big Ten powers with game footage and photographs.  The show is narrated by football legend Pat Summerall but the real story is told through the words of the greats who did battle on the field in “The Horseshoe” in Columbus, Ohio and “The Big House” in Ann Arbor, Michigan.  This is the definitive history of arguably the most intense border war rivalry in college football, the Ohio State Buckeyes and the Michigan Wolverines.
response.title: Rivalries: The History of Michigan vs Ohio State
